description:
The Oda clan decides to go through Chigusa Pass on their way back from Kyoto to Gifu. However, Rokkaku Yoshikata, who had lost to Nobunaga before, was waiting for them. He sends a Koga ninja to assisinate Nobunaga and he aims a rifle at the unsuspecting Nobunaga...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La platine à mèche d`un ninja
